description: From Middle English lampe lyght, laumpe-lyth, lombe-lyȝt, equivalent to lamp +‎ light. Compare West Frisian lampeljocht (“lamplight”), Dutch lamplicht (“lamplight”), German Lampenlicht (“lamplight”), Danish lampelys (“lamplight”), Swedish lampljus (“lamplight”), Icelandic lampaljós (“lamplight”).

entries.meaning: The light emitted by a lamp.
examples: We sat around reading by lamplight all night.
